name: Burntime - Pocket Edition
description:
THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT AND AN EARLY PROTOTYPE!

The original Burnout game was done by Max Design in 1993 for PC (MS-DOS) and Amiga. All the credits for game design, graphics and music belongs to them. I just try to make a demake of the game on GameBoy via GBStudio 

I will try to transfer as much content of the original game as possible to the GameBoy hardware. Due to hardware limitations i will have to make changes to game design and other aspects of the game. At the end it will hopefully a fun game that will catch the spirit of the oldschool classic.

In the near future there will also be a file available to play it on real GameBoy Hardware.

Version alpha V 0.1

The first published file of Burntime - Pocket Edition

First of all I implemented the menu system for the game and the ability to travel from town to town. Right now there are only 2 towns visitable but more will be added in the near future.
You can catch up some food, water and other stuff in your inventory. Rearrange them on different slots or buildings. 

  • menu system ( A to move and B to eat / drink or refill water )
  • travel to Anif and Outback
  • water will be filled up in the buildings with a water source
  • at the end of your day, empty bottles will be refilled if placed in buildings with a water source
  • you can drink water and ad days of water to survive
  • if you visit a building with water source your days of water will be filled
  • food can be eaten and will ad days of food to survive
  • you can place a knife in a building (must be a building WITHOUT water source) and there will be maggots placed on empty space every day

How to play in browser:

Up - Up Arrow / W
Down - Down Arrow / S  
Left - Left Arrow / A  
Right - Right Arrow / D  

A - Ctrl / K / X 
B -  Alt / Z / J  

Start - Enter  
Select - Shift
